title: Uchi no Tsuma wa, Watashi wo Ijou ni Aishiteiru
description: Housewife Yuriko and her husband Fuyuki appears to be a happy couple. But in reality, Fuyuki's love towards his wife is far from being "normal". He is extremely possessive and manipulative. When Fuyuki's mother suddenly passed away, Akira, Fuyuki's younger brother, moved into the couple's house and began to notice the bruises on Yuriko's body...
